name: Super Fine Sleigh Ride
description:
A game made in the month of December for the Great Winter Game Jam (missed deadline) & Starcrush's holday jam.

A Christmas themed clone of Super Amazing Wagon Adventure. Choose your own way through some silly shoot-em-up levels as Santa Claus!

Music by CheekyLions

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

LEFT MOUSE - select/shoot
